entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:25 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 13.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 03:30 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 13.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 12.6°C
Wind: SW 47 km/h gust 69 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low 9 except temperature steady near plus 5 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 this evening. Low 9 except temperature steady near plus 5 along parts of the coast. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. High 11 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few showers changing to rain at times heavy in the morning. Fog patches dissipating late in the afternoon. Amount 20 to 30 mm except 50 mm in areas of heaviest rain. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High 11 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 in the evening. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
